Package net.trajano.sonar.plugins.reverseproxyauth

Reverse Proxy Authenticator plugin for Sonar.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ReverseProxyAuthPlugin
    Plugin entry point.
    ReverseProxyAuthRealm
    The security realm.
    ReverseProxyAuthSettings
    Wraps the settings object so it provides a type safe interface rather than using strings.
    ReverseProxyAuthUsersIdentityProvider
    This provides the user details.
    ReverseProxyAuthUsersProvider
    This provides the user details.
    ValidateRedirectionFilter
    This filter redirects the request for new sessions to /sessions/init/reverseproxyauth automatically if realm is set to "reverseproxyauth" and is not "localhost".

Package net.trajano.sonar.plugins.reverseproxyauth Description

Reverse Proxy Authenticator plugin for Sonar. Reverse Proxy Authenticator plugin for Sonar
